quote: Let me fall if I must fall. The one I'll become will catch me.
author: Baal Shem Tov

quote: Spend Money on Experiences, Not Things.
author: Anonymous

quote: When death finds you, may it find you alive.
author: African Proverb

quote: Wisdom springs from reflection, folly from reaction.
author: Anonymous

quote: You're most powerful when you are humble and kind.
author: Anonymous
